name: caleb
cooked:
Hi Nicolas,

There aren’t any official OSHWA meetings in the area but there is a thriving Open community in Boulder and the surrounding area. If you check out MeetUp you might be able to find a group of like-minded individuals while you are in town. This should be a good place to start https://www.meetup.com/topics/opensource/us/co/boulder/

Unfortunately, I’m out of town until the 30th and probably won’t be able to meet up with you while you’re around as I’m down in Aurora

Best of luck! I hope you are able to find a group to meet up with while you are in town!
raw:
Hi Nicolas,

There aren't any official OSHWA meetings in the area but there is a thriving Open community in Boulder and the surrounding area. If you check out MeetUp you might be able to find a group of like-minded individuals while you are in town. This should be a good place to start https://www.meetup.com/topics/opensource/us/co/boulder/ 

Unfortunately, I'm out of town until the 30th and probably won't be able to meet up with you while you're around as I'm down in Aurora :/ 

Best of luck! I hope you are able to find a group to meet up with while you are in town!
